title: Website and Web App Development
copy: Craft responsive, scalable, and user-friendly websites and web applications using React, JavaScript, and Svelte. Whether it’s a dynamic web app or a custom business website, I deliver fast, modern, and engaging solutions tailored to your needs.

title: E-Commerce Development
copy: Build and launch feature-rich online stores using WordPress (WooCommerce) and Shopify. From payment gateways to product management, I create seamless shopping experiences designed to boost sales and customer satisfaction.

title: Digital Marketing
copy: Grow your business through highly effective campaigns on Google Ads and Meta Ads. I specialize in optimizing ad performance to generate leads, increase conversions, and improve ROI.

title: Cross-Platform Mobile App Development
copy: Develop responsive and high-performance mobile apps using React Native. Deliver seamless user experiences across iOS and Android with offline support and auto-update features.

title: SEO (Search Engine Optimization)
copy: Enhance your website’s ranking with proven SEO strategies. From keyword research and on-page optimization to link building and technical SEO, I ensure your site stays ahead of the competition.

title: Maintenance & Support
copy: Ensure your website or application stays secure, updated, and optimized. I provide continuous maintenance, bug fixes, and performance improvements so you can focus on growing your business.
